description: Unfortunately most studs are not plumb. I wet shimmed these using Schluter ALL-SET and 2-inch screws. I ensured the boards were plumb and didn't fully sink the screws until a few hours afterward. When you join our Video Library today you'll also get our Beginner Curbed Shower Remodeling Course for free at https://homerepairtutor.com/platinum-membership/
title: How to Wet Shim KERDI-BOARD Shower Walls - #shorts #homerepairtutor
